allow: Bash(git add .github/hooks/ scripts/Install-GitHooks.ps1 scripts/New-TestFile.ps1 scripts/Invoke-Tests.ps1 tests/Helpers/Templates/ docs/TESTING-STRATEGY.md)
Bash(git add STATUS.md DECISIONS.md README.md CLAUDE.md)
Bash(git add CONTRIBUTORS.md LICENSE README.md todo/006-contributors-documentation.md todo/INDEX.md todo/backlog/ .claude/runbook/2025-10-19.md)

Bash(pwsh.exe -NoProfile -Command '
$content = Get-Content scripts/Install-GitHooks.ps1 -Raw
$content = $content -replace ''(?s)# Paths\r?\n\$sourceHook = Join-Path \$repoRoot ""\.github/hooks/pre-commit""\r?\n\$gitHooksDir = Join-Path \$repoRoot ""\.git/hooks""\r?\n\$targetHook = Join-Path \$gitHooksDir ""pre-commit""'', ''# Paths
$sourceHookWrapper = Join-Path $repoRoot "".github/hooks/pre-commit""
$sourceHookPs1 = Join-Path $repoRoot "".github/hooks/pre-commit.ps1""
$gitHooksDir = Join-Path $repoRoot "".git/hooks""
$targetHookWrapper = Join-Path $gitHooksDir ""pre-commit""
$targetHookPs1 = Join-Path $gitHooksDir ""pre-commit.ps1""''
$content | Set-Content scripts/Install-GitHooks.ps1.new -NoNewline
Move-Item scripts/Install-GitHooks.ps1.new scripts/Install-GitHooks.ps1 -Force
Write-Host ""Step 1 done""
')
